frontmatter.title: Designing Automated Microservice
frontmatter.description: Designing automated microservices is a real benefit to the team.

frontmatter.title: Designing Autonomous Microservice
frontmatter.description: Designing an autonomous microservices. The article discusses why and how to design self-sufficient and self-governing services

frontmatter.title: Designing Observable Microservice
frontmatter.description: Designing an observable microservices. The article discusses why and how microservices should be monitored

frontmatter.title: Designing High Cohesion Microservice
frontmatter.description: Designing a highly cohesive microservices. The article discussed couple of examples of live and well-defined self aggregated microservices

frontmatter.title: Designing Business Centric Microservice
frontmatter.description: Designing a domain specific microservices. The article discussed couple of examples of live and well-defined business centric microservices
